column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I liked the place
column2: but it did not really distinguish it self.  Recently
column3: I have been to other places that are much better for less money.  Their location is right near a lot of big hotels
column4: so everyone there was eating with their kids.  This place is very popular for families traveling to Chicago.  The sausage was good ( a lot like Jimmy Dean's)
column5: but not special.  The pancakes again were good
column6: but not better than other places.  If you are in area with your kids a good place to eat.
